events.name: Indy Hack Day
events.about:
WHY A HACK DAY?

Indiana has a talented community of developers and designers. But we dont have an event we can all attend. We thought it would be great to get together to work on our projects, see what others are doing and learn from each other.

Its a way to bring developers and designers together. The event has an open schedule. What you do while youre here is up to you. This is our version of an unconference. Well end the day with a mixer so you can unwind and network.

Check out the site for more info http://indyhackday.com

WHOS IT FOR?

Indy Hack Day is exclusively for developers and designers. Were serious about it. Thats why we ask for your LinkedIn profile and Twitter handle.

We want to provide an environment free of the business guys, salesmen and recruiters. If you write code, do graphic design, work with typography or design user experiences this is for you.

REASONS TO COME

Spend a day working on your project
Meet other talented devs & designers
Take a workshop
Lunch and dinner is provided

WHERES THIS SHINDIG?

The Speak Easy

5255 North Winthrop Avenue Indianapolis, Indiana 46220 USA

The Speak Easy is a new place for Indianapolis-based entrepreneurs, startups to work, play, and collaborate. We thought it was the perfect spot for our hack day.

WHOS IT FOR?
